description: This view contains the driver assignment source data

schema.name: sam_number
schema.description: SAM number for set of orgs

schema.name: is_paid_safety_customer
schema.description: Whether the SAM has Safety licenses or not

schema.name: is_paid_telematics_customer
schema.description: Whether the SAM has Telematics licenses or not

schema.name: is_paid_stce_customer
schema.description: Whether the SAM has STCE licenses or not

schema.name: sign_in_reminder_enabled
schema.description: Whether the account is enabled for sign-in reminders or not

schema.name: inward_assigned_trip_duration
schema.description: Total number of VG trip minutes assigned to a driver with an inward CM

schema.name: inward_total_trip_duration
schema.description: Total number of VG trip minutes with an inward CM

schema.name: outward_assigned_trip_duration
schema.description: Total number of VG trip minutes assigned to a driver with an outward CM

schema.name: outward_total_trip_duration
schema.description: Total number of VG trip minutes with an outward CM

schema.name: no_cm_assigned_trip_duration
schema.description: Total number of VG trip minutes assigned to a driver with no CM

schema.name: no_cm_total_trip_duration
schema.description: Total number of VG trip minutes with no CM
